1.title: Hunting Bear Naked
1.plot: Ryan Kohler returns... but this time he's definitely off the Edge. Andy Sr. (Andrew Sparacino of FUBAR fame) arrives at bear camp eager to learn to hunt and earn Ryan's respect. But, after a challenging first day of introducing his 'unique' perspective and antics to Ryan, it's a surprise revelation from Andy Sr. that impresses him the most.

2.title: Small Game Love Affair
2.plot: Andy Sr. aims to improve his mastery of guns and bows with Ryan. But, is it really love at first sight that's in his crosshairs?

3.title: Where is Andy?
3.plot: Big cats, snow tracks and not an Andy in sight. However, Ryan does manage to track down NHL'er Eric Gryba, a giant mountain lion, and the 'other' Andy!

4.title: Shed Hunt Mixup
4.plot: There's an epic shed waiting to be uncovered in the woods and Ryan & Andi Jr. form Team Randi to track down the giant antler.

5.title: Road Kill Madness
5.plot: Roles get reversed when Ryan agrees to allow Andi Jr. to take him hunting. But her idea of 'hunting' is enough to make even Ryan a little squeamish.

6.title: Bear with Andi
6.plot: You never know what the circle of life has in store but, for 'team Randi' it means impromptu antique shopping, a return to bear camp and phone call that will change everything!

imdb.plot outline: Ryan Kohler from The Edge breaks out on his own with a series unlike ever seen before. Ryan Goes Rogue: Off the Edge is an all new series featuring small and big game hunting adventures but with an added twist to the story. Ryan partnered with Hunting for Tomorrow through their mentorship program and the winning candidate gets a chance to join Ryan on his hunting adventures. But what Ryan doesn't know, is that his world is about to get turned upside down. It's a mega mix-up when a father steals the application from his daughter and presents himself as the winning candidate. This new series will leave you laughing as the hunting hilarity unfolds while this unique father-daughter duo does their best to push Ryan, off the edge.
imdb.title: Ryan Goes Rogue

production companies.name: Recoil Creative Films and Television Production

plot: Ryan Kohler from The Edge breaks out on his own with a series unlike ever seen before. _Ryan Goes Rogue_ (qv): Off the Edge is an all new series featuring small and big game hunting adventures but with an added twist to the story.::Wild TV
